channel.title: 508 drops help
channel.description: Hi, on my 508 server all of the players can see eachothers drops and loot them. I am wondering if there is anyway I can fix this?

item.title: 508 drops help
item.dc:creator: @kiddryan77 kiddryan77
item.description:
@kiddryan77 wrote:

Were is item class at? In the client or source?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 drops help
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Find:

if (g.itemGroundTime == 100) { if (!isUntradable(g.itemId) && !g.itemDroppedBy.equals("")) { actionSender.removeGroundItem(engine.players[engine.getIdFromName(g.itemDroppedBy)], g.itemId, g.itemX, g.itemY, g.itemHeight); createGlobalItem(g.itemId, g.itemAmt, g.itemX, g.itemY, g.itemHeight); } }

In your Items class.

Replace it with this:

/*if (g.itemGroundTime == 100) { if (!isUntradable(g.itemId) && !g.itemDroppedBy.equals("")) { actionSender.removeGroundItem(engine.players[engine.getIdFromName(g.itemDroppedBy)], g.itemId, g.itemX, g.itemY, g.itemHeight); createGlobalItem(g.itemId, g.itemAmt, g.itemX, g.itemY, g.itemHeight); } } */

Read full topic
